page.title: 16Home Life in Bramdean
page.content: Many homes have modern labour saving appliances such as washing machines, refrigerators, deep freezes, electric cookers and dish washers. Other additions to home life such as telephones, televisions, music centres, and videos are also in increasing use. Most homes have a garden under cultivation, many of these grow vegetables for home consumption. Other country cooking skills such as preserving, wine making, etc., are still practised. The hobbies carried out by the villagers are many and varied; including painting, embroidery, dressmaking, photography and beekeeping. Many homes have domestic pets.
